fb_code.title: Facebook locale code (eg: en_US, es_ES, etc)

shareListPromptMessage.title: 'Liked this list? Share it with your friends!'
shareListPromptMessage.default: Liked this list? Share it with your friends!

loginBtn.title: 'Login' button text used in many places

logoutBtn.title: 'Logout' button text used in many places

myProfile.title: 'My profile' button text used in many places

settings.title: 'Settings' button text used in many places

closeBtn.title: 'Close' button text used in many places

signUpBtn.title: 'Sign up' button text used in many places

loggingYouIn.title: 'Logging you in...' message shown while logging in

fbPermissionError.title: 'Facebook login error!' message shown while permission error occurs while logging in
fbPermissionError.default: Facebook login error! You must allow the permissions to log in Facebook

fbNoEmailError.title: 'Facebook email ID cannot be obtained - error!'
fbNoEmailError.default: Facebook login error! Your email cannot be obtained. Either you have disallowed email permission or you don't have a verified email ID on your Facebook account.
fbNoEmailError.description: Message shown when the user's email ID cannot be obtained from Facebook due to disallowed permission or if the user hasn't verified his email on his Facebook account

noListsYet.title: 'No lists yet!' message shown if there are no lists to show

hereAreSomeLists.title: 'Here are some awesome lists' heading shown above lists list

loadingList.title: 'Loading list..' message shown before a list is loaded

youMayAlsoLike.title: 'You may also like' heading shown above related lists

viewMoreLists.title: 'View more lists' link shown below related lists in 'view list' page

create.title: 'Create' - The create button text in navbar

generalLoginPromptMessage.title: 'Login to create your own lists' - The general login prompt message shown in the login popup
generalLoginPromptMessage.default: Login to create your own lists and edit others'.

loginToCreate.title: 'Login to create your own lists' message in the login popup shown when users try to 'Create' lists
loginToCreate.default: Login to create your own lists and edit others'.

createListPageHeading.title: 'Create a list' - Heading of the 'create list' page

changesWillNeedApprovalAgain.title: 'This list is currently approved! If you make any changes it will need to be approved again by admin.'
changesWillNeedApprovalAgain.description: Notice message to be shown while editing approved list(if auto approval of updates is disabled

someErrorsInInput.title: 'There are some errors in the data you submitted. Please correct them and try again.'
someErrorsInInput.description: Error message to be shown when server-side validation of user input fails.
someErrorsInInput.default: There are some errors in the data you submitted. Please correct them and try again.

thisListIsNotSubmittedForApproval.title: 'This list is not submitted for approval'

thisListIsNotPublishedYet.title: 'This list is not published yet. Publish it to let others view this list.'
thisListIsNotPublishedYet.default: This list is not published yet. Publish it to let others view this list.

onlyYouCouldViewThis.title: 'Only you could view this list now.'
onlyYouCouldViewThis.default: Only you could view this list now.

someChangesPendingApproval.title: 'Some changes are pending approval'
someChangesPendingApproval.default: Some changes are pending approval. They will appear once they are approved.

editListMessage.title: 'You can edit this list....' - Edit this list message
editListMessage.default: You can edit this list and make your own list and share with your friends on Facebook and Twitter

editThisListBtnText.title: 'Edit this list' - Edit this list button text

youAreEditingThisList.title: 'You are editing this list'
youAreEditingThisList.description: Alert shown when a user is editing another user's list

missingOrInvalidInputCheckMarkedRed.title: 'Missing or invalid input. Check the fields marked in red.'
missingOrInvalidInputCheckMarkedRed.default: Missing or invalid input. Check the fields marked in red.

listBanner.title: 'Preview Image' - List's main Image's placeholder text

yourListTitleHere.title: 'Your list title here' - Title field placeholder

yourListDescriptionHere.title: 'Your list description here' - Description field placeholder

notSelected.title: 'Not selected' - Default value to be displayed for 'select' fields

changesWillNeedApprovalAgain.title: 'If you change this list, it will not be available until it is approved again.'
changesWillNeedApprovalAgain.description: The warning to be shown when the user tries to edit one of his already approved list
changesWillNeedApprovalAgain.default: If you change this list, it will not be available until it is approved again.

saveDraft.title: 'Save draft' - 'Save draft' button text on the 'create list' page

publishList.title: 'Publish list' - 'Publish list' button text on the 'create list' page

saveChanges.title: 'Save changes' - 'Save changes' button text on the 'edit list' page

viewList.title: 'View list' - 'View list' button text on the 'create list' page

preview.title: 'Preview' - 'Preview' button text on the 'create list' page

invalidFieldInputError.title: 'Invalid input' - Generic Invalid field input error

emptyFieldError.title: 'This field should not be empty'
emptyFieldError.default: This field should not be empty

dropOrClickToUpload.title: 'Drop files here or click to upload.'
dropOrClickToUpload.default: Drop files here or click to upload.

nowPublishTheList.title: 'You may now publish the list to make it available to public'
nowPublishTheList.default: You may now publish the list to make it available to public

willBeApprovedByAdmin.title: 'Submitted for publishing! It will be available once approved by admin.'
willBeApprovedByAdmin.default: Submitted for publishing! It will be available once approved by admin.

changesWillBeApprovedByAdmin.title: 'Changes submitted for publishing! It will be visible to users once approved by admin.
changesWillBeApprovedByAdmin.default: Changes submitted for publishing! It will be visible to users once approved by admin.

listWillBePublishedAfterApproval.title: 'List will be published after approval'
listWillBePublishedAfterApproval.default: List will be published after approval

listNotSaved.title: 'List not saved' - error dialog title for error while saving list

uploadedImageInvalidOrBig.title: 'Uploaded image is invalid or too big'
uploadedImageInvalidOrBig.default: Uploaded image is invalid or too big

changesToThisListArePendingApproval.title: 'Changes to this list are pending approval. The changes will be visible to users once it is approved.'
changesToThisListArePendingApproval.default: Changes to this list are pending approval. The changes will be visible to users once it is approved.

alreadyRegisteredLoginHere.title: 'Already registered? Click here to login.'
alreadyRegisteredLoginHere.default: Already registered? Click here to login.

dontHaveAccountSignupHere.title: 'Don't have an account? Sign up here.'
dontHaveAccountSignupHere.default: Don't have an account? Sign up here.

registrationSuccessfulConfirmEmailNow.title: 'Confirm your email by clicking the confirmation link in the email we just sent you.'
registrationSuccessfulConfirmEmailNow.default: Confirm your email by clicking the confirmation link in the email we just sent you.

confirmationEmailSent.title: 'Confirmation email sent. Please check your inbox.'
confirmationEmailSent.default: Confirmation email sent. Please check your inbox.

successfullyVerifiedEmail.title: 'You have successfully verified your account.'
successfullyVerifiedEmail.default: You have successfully verified your account.

emailNotConfirmedYet.title: 'You have not verified your email ID yet. Please verify and try again.'
emailNotConfirmedYet.default: You have not verified your email ID yet. Please verify and try again.
